Title: Zazie dans le Métro
Writer: Raymond Queneau (novel), Louis Malle, Jean-Paul Rappeneau
Actors: Catherine Demongeot, Philippe Noiret, Hubert Deschamps, Carla Marlier
Plot: This merry farce depicts a satirical view of the French society: Ten-year-old Zazie has to stay two days with her relatives in Paris, so that her mother can spend some time with her lover. However Zazie escapes her uncle's custody and sets out to explore Paris on her own.
